description: This file defines the LiveTvActivity class, which is a FragmentActivity hosting a fragment that lists TV channels. It includes lifecycle management, fragment transaction logic, and a companion object with a method to create an Intent for starting this activity.

classes.name: LiveTvActivity
classes.description: An activity that hosts a fragment listing live TV channels. It manages fragment transactions and provides a helper method to create intents.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when the activity is starting. Sets up the fragment container view and adds the LiveTvFragment if this is a new creation.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: Static method to create an Intent for starting LiveTvActivity, given a Context.
